original_title: 劇場版 昆虫物語 みつばちハッチ 勇気のメロディ
overview: Hutch the Honey Bee and friends set on an adventure to find Hutch's missing Queen Bee Mother, whom he lost during a surprise attack by a group of Hornets. In the process Hutch makes friends with various other animals. At a town called Sepiatown he even befriends Amy, a kindhearted human girl who can talk with insects ...
title: Hutch the Honeybee
